scripts.deploy: DEPLOYMENT=cloudflare bun run build && bun run deploy:pages && bun run deploy:r2
scripts.deploy:pages: bun -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist-pages', {recursive:true})" && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*" dist-pages/ && wrangler pages deploy dist-pages --project-name pob-web
scripts.deploy:r2: aws s3 cp --region auto --endpoint-url https://621480c42e70995622a2d0a86bb7751c.r2.cloudflarestorage.com --recursive --exclude '*' --include '.r2-*' dist/ s3://pob-web/asset/
